Control.ttp: nlThis page provides information related to System Settings.

Control.lbl: nlBypass proxy server for local addresses:
Control.ttp: nlSynchronize the date and time on the device with the date and time on my computer.
nlChecked indicates that Proxy is enabled on this device.
nlClick to display online help related to this page...
nlClick to open the print dialog for sending the contents of this page to the default printer...

Messages.Message: nl'Internet Proxy Host' minimum length is 4.
nl'Internet Proxy Host' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
nl'Internet Proxy Port' minimum length is 2.
nl'Internet Proxy Port' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
